ing: 2 (15 ounce) cans garbanzo beans, rinsed and drained
1/4 cup roasted red peppers, or more to taste
1 tablespoon white vinegar, or to taste
n: Roasted Red Pepper Hummus With a Twist From Nidal
des: "As a spread, dip, or garlicky pita filling, roasted red pepper hummus is both delicious and satisfying. Best of all, it's whipped up in seconds in a blender or food processor. Garnish with parsley and chopped roasted red peppers. You can add water to thin the hummus, if desired."
ins:
Blend garbanzo beans, tahini, red peppers, 1/2 of the lemon juice, vinegar, garlic, and salt together in a blender or food processor until hummus is smooth, adding more lemon juice as necessary to reach desired consistency.
Pour hummus into a serving bowl; drizzle with olive oil and a pinch of paprika.
